rel.why: lib/i18n contains locale configuration and routing/i18n strategy support.
lib/privacy contains consent state and cookie persistence logic.
lib/seo will map to SEO/metadata requirements once implemented.
lib/wp contains the headless WordPress client/types/queries/mappers.

notes: lib/seo exists but is currently empty (implementation TBD).

groups.name: i18n
groups.purpose: i18n configuration and locale routing support.

groups.name: privacy
groups.purpose: Consent state management and cookie persistence utilities.

groups.name: wp
groups.purpose: Headless WordPress integration (client, queries, types, mappers).
